sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './CartPage.css' import { cartInfo } from '../../data/cart' function CartPage() { return (

Your Shopping Cart

{cartInfo.map((item) => (
Title: {item.title}
Author: {item.author}
{item.quantity}
${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))}
ORDER SUMMARY
Subtotal $ {cartInfo.reduce((acc, cur) => acc + cur.price * cur.quantity, 0)}
Shipping Cost 0
Discount 0
Total {/* $ {cartInfo.reduce((acc, cur) => acc + cur.price * cur.quantity, 0).toFixed(2)} */}
) } export default CartPage
